title: Suberu wo Itowazu
original_name: 森田まさのり短編集 スベルヲイトワズ
sinopse:
A collection of seven short stories and a collection of color pages from Rokudenashi Blues from Morita Masanori's career.

1. Suberu wo Itowazu (Setting Up to Fail)
2. Bachi-Atari Rock
3. Let's Spend The Night Together
4. Jumpin' Jack Flash
5. Synchronicity
6. Mysterious Kid (ミステリアス・キッド)
7. Stay Here
